title: 93/188/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 March 1993 amending Decision 92/486/EEC establishing the form of cooperation between the Animo host centre and Member States
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of  4 March 1993 amending Decision 92/486/EEC establishing the form of cooperation between the Animo  host centre and Member States
(93/188/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 92/486/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1.  In Article 2 the first indent is replaced by:
'-  enter into force for three years beginning on 1 April 1993,`.
2.  The following indent is added to Article 2:
'-  include a clause covering updating, protection and availability of data, responsibilities, and  the payment schedule.` 3.  In Article 4, '1 July 1993` is replaced by '1 April 1994`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 March 1993.
For the Commission RenĂŠ STEICHEN Member of the Commission
